Class AuthenticationController

  • java.lang.Object
    • Users.AuthenticationController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    public class AuthenticationController
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    This class implements the AuthenticationControlller of the app, who is in charge of controlling activities as checking the credentials of someone, checking the security question of a user...
